message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate down to that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I am still unable to meet you at $17,500. I would like to propose $16,000 as my maximum offer.
